dct_title_s: Rutgers University, Newark, New Jersey 1947 map 1
dct_description_sm: Hand drawn and written map of two sections of Newark, New Jersey depicting the Rutgers University College of Pharmacy and the proposed Law Center. Creatd June 1947 with revisions Sept. 21, 1956 and April 2, 1959. Street and block sizes are not in true proportion.
